Role.Name: ConfigureAdmin
Role.Description: By default allows to view, change and add/remove everything but permissions

Role.Name: SecurityAdmin
Role.Description: By default allows to change only permissions

Role.Name: Operator
Role.Description: By default allows to view and change everything (but no add/remove)

Role.Name: Observer
Role.Description: By default allows to view everything

Role.Name: EndUserAdmin
Role.Description: Intended to manage (including add/remove) all users except system users (those having ConfigureAdmin or SecurityAdmin role)

AuthMethod.Name: Password
AuthMethod.Prompt: Log in using username and password

Alarm.Description: Alarm is triggered (with Text containing the list of errors) when some node of the component (like operator) has configuration fault.
Alarm.Name: ConfigurationFaults
